title: Playing with the Devil
text:
Playing with the Devil () is a 1956 Czech fairy-tale <a href="comedy%20film">comedy film</a> by <a href="Josef%20Mach">Josef Mach</a> based on a 1945 play by <a href="Jan%20Drda">Jan Drda</a>. Set decorations were painted by <a href="Josef%20Lada">Josef Lada</a>.
Other adaptations.
In 1979, another film adaptation was made in <a href="Poland">Poland</a> and continues to be popular. It was directed by <a href="Tadeusz%20Lis">Tadeusz Lis</a> and starred well-known <a href="Poland">Polish</a> actors <a href="Janusz%20Gajos">Janusz Gajos</a>, <a href="Jerzy%20Kamas">Jerzy Kamas</a>, <a href="Marian%20Kociniak">Marian Kociniak</a> and <a href="Marek%20Kondrat">Marek Kondrat</a>.
